import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)

df[''studentId''] = df[''studentId''].astype\(str\)
result = df[df[''studentId''].isin\(target_ids\)][[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'']]
print\(result.to_string\(\)\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\ansel\\my_research_exporter\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ""
import pandas as pd

# CSV 파일 읽기
filepath = ''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/1_participants_info.csv''
df = pd.read_csv\(filepath, encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)

# studentId를 문자열로 변환
df[''studentId''] = df[''studentId''].astype\(str\)

# 대상 학번
target_ids = [''243135'', ''250748'', ''250538'']

# 성별 업데이트
for sid in target_ids:
    mask = df[''studentId''] == sid
    if mask.any\(\):
        df.loc[mask, ''gender''] = ''여자''
        print\(f''Updated studentId {sid}: gender -> 여자''\)

# 저장
df.to_csv\(filepath, index=False, encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
print\(''\\nFile saved successfully!''\)

# 확인
result = df[df[''studentId''].isin\(target_ids\)][[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'']]
print\(''\\nUpdated records:''\)
print\(result.to_string\(\)\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\ansel\\my_research_exporter\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ""
import pandas as pd

# complete/filtered 폴더 확인
df = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete/filtered/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
df[''studentId''] = df[''studentId''].astype\(str\)

target_ids = [''243135'', ''250748'', ''250538'']
result = df[df[''studentId''].isin\(target_ids\)][[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'']]
print\(''complete/filtered 폴더에서 찾은 결과:''\)
print\(result.to_string\(\) if len\(result\) > 0 else ''없음''\)
print\(f''\\n전체 인원: {len\(df\)}명''\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\ansel\\my_research_exporter\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ""
import pandas as pd

# 기존 complete_filtered \(아직 업데이트 안 됨 - 12/11 날짜\)
old_path = ''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete_filtered/1_participants_info.csv''
old_df = pd.read_csv\(old_path, encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
old_ids = set\(old_df[''participantId''].unique\(\)\)

# 새로운 complete/filtered \(12/18 날짜\)
new_path = ''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete/filtered/1_participants_info.csv''
new_df = pd.read_csv\(new_path, encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
new_ids = set\(new_df[''participantId''].unique\(\)\)

print\(f''기존 \(complete_filtered\): {len\(old_ids\)}명''\)
print\(f''새로운 \(complete/filtered\): {len\(new_ids\)}명''\)

# 새로 추가된 참가자
added = new_ids - old_ids
print\(f''\\n새로 추가된 참가자: {len\(added\)}명''\)

if added:
    added_df = new_df[new_df[''participantId''].isin\(added\)][[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'']]
    added_df[''studentId''] = added_df[''studentId''].astype\(str\)
    print\(added_df.to_string\(\)\)

# 제외된 참가자
removed = old_ids - new_ids
print\(f''\\n제외된 참가자: {len\(removed\)}명''\)
if removed:
    removed_df = old_df[old_df[''participantId''].isin\(removed\)][[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'']]
    print\(removed_df.to_string\(\)\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\ansel\\my_research_exporter\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ""
import pandas as pd

target_id = ''YzmMCD3ZmzbWlV4pTQ6hvDdnuMk2''
target_student = ''225713''

# 1. 기존 complete_filtered에 있었는지
old_filtered = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete_filtered/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
in_old_filtered = target_id in old_filtered[''participantId''].values
print\(f''1. 기존 complete_filtered \(185명\)에 있었나? {in_old_filtered}''\)

# 2. 새 raw 데이터에서 정보 확인
new_raw = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
new_raw[''studentId''] = new_raw[''studentId''].astype\(str\)
participant = new_raw[new_raw[''participantId''] == target_id]
if len\(participant\) > 0:
    print\(f''\\n2. raw 데이터 정보:''\)
    print\(participant[[''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'', ''createdAt'']].to_string\(\)\)

# 3. 이 참가자의 createdAt 확인
if len\(participant\) > 0:
    created = participant[''createdAt''].values[0]
    print\(f''\\n3. 생성일: {created}''\)

# 4. 기존 raw에 있었는지 확인 \(git으로 확인 불가하니 추정\)
# 대신 complete 폴더에서 확인
new_complete = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
in_new_complete = target_id in new_complete[''participantId''].values
print\(f''\\n4. 새 complete \(205명\)에 있나? {in_new_complete}''\)

# 5. 설문/과제 완료 상태 확인
surveys = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/2_surveys_results.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
participant_surveys = surveys[surveys[''participantId''] == target_id]
print\(f''\\n5. 설문 데이터:''\)
print\(participant_surveys[[''surveyName'', ''score'', ''score_D'', ''score_A'', ''score_S'']].to_string\(\)\)

# 6. 인지과제 요약
cognitive = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/3_cognitive_tests_summary.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
participant_cog = cognitive[cognitive[''participantId''] == target_id]
print\(f''\\n6. 인지과제 요약:''\)
for _, row in participant_cog.iterrows\(\):
    test = row[''testName'']
    print\(f''  - {test}: n_trials={row.get\(""n_trials"", ""N/A""\)}, accuracy={row.get\(""accuracy"", ""N/A""\)}''\)
""")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\ansel\\my_research_exporter\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe'' -c ""
import pandas as pd

target_id = ''YzmMCD3ZmzbWlV4pTQ6hvDdnuMk2''

# 1. 기존 complete_filtered에 있었는지
old_filtered = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete_filtered/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
in_old_filtered = target_id in old_filtered[''participantId''].values
print\(f''1. 기존 complete_filtered \(185명\)에 있었나? {in_old_filtered}''\)

# 2. 새 raw 데이터에서 정보 확인
new_raw = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
new_raw[''studentId''] = new_raw[''studentId''].astype\(str\)
participant = new_raw[new_raw[''participantId''] == target_id]
if len\(participant\) > 0:
    print\(f''\\n2. raw 데이터 정보:''\)
    for col in [''participantId'', ''studentId'', ''gender'', ''age'', ''createdAt'']:
        val = participant[col].values[0]
        print\(f''   {col}: {val}''\)

# 3. 새 complete에 있는지
new_complete = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/complete/1_participants_info.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
in_new_complete = target_id in new_complete[''participantId''].values
print\(f''\\n3. 새 complete \(205명\)에 있나? {in_new_complete}''\)

# 4. 설문 데이터
surveys = pd.read_csv\(''C:/Users/ansel/my_research_exporter/publication/data/raw/2_surveys_results.csv'', encoding=''utf-8-sig''\)
participant_surveys = surveys[surveys[''participantId''] == target_id]
print\(f''\\n4. 설문 데이터: {len\(participant_surveys\)}개''\)
for _, row in participant_surveys.iterrows\(\):
    name = row[''surveyName'']
    if name.lower\(\) == ''ucla'':
        print\(f''   UCLA: score={row[""score""]}''\)
    elif ''dass'' in name.lower\(\):
        print\(f''   DASS: D={row[""score_D""]}, A={row[""score_A""]}, S={row[""score_S""]}''\)
""")
